```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)
library(DBI)

# ignore chunk output
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  out.width = "80%",
  fig.align = "center",
  cache=TRUE
)

# automatically create a bib database for R packages
knitr::write_bib(c(
  .packages(), 'bookdown', 'knitr', 'rmarkdown'
), 'packages.bib')
```
